llama2_direct_sole-planning_results:
Great! Based on the information provided, here's a suggested travel plan for your week-long trip from Punta Gorda to three different cities in Michigan:

Day 1 (March 6th): Punta Gorda to Alpena

* Distance: 204 km (127 miles) | Duration: 2 hours 29 minutes | Cost: $10

You'll depart from Punta Gorda and drive northwest to Alpena, where you'll spend the night. En route, you can stop at the scenic Tawas Bay State Park for a quick hike or beach time. Once in Alpena, you can explore the town's waterfront area, visit the Alpena County Historical Museum, and enjoy some local American cuisine at one of the city's restaurants.

Day 2 (March 7th): Alpena to Traverse City

* Distance: 204 km (127 miles) | Duration: 2 hours 29 minutes | Cost: $10

After breakfast, you'll leave Alpena and drive northwest to Traverse City. En route, you can stop at the Cherry Capital Airport for some sightseeing and take in the beautiful views of the surrounding countryside. Once in Traverse City, you can explore the downtown area, visit the Grand Traverse Bay, and try some local French cuisine at one of the city's restaurants.

Day 3 (March 8th): Traverse City to Pellston

* Distance: 137 km (85 miles) | Duration: 1 hour 49 minutes | Cost: $6

After breakfast, you'll leave Traverse City and drive northeast to Pellston. En route, you can stop at the scenic Charlevoix State Park for some hiking or beach time. Once in Pellston, you can explore the town's historic district, visit the Pellston Historical Society Museum, and enjoy some local American cuisine at one of the town's restaurants.

Day 4 (March 9th): Pellston to Alpena

* Distance: 204 km (127 miles) | Duration: 2 hours 29 minutes | Cost: $10

After breakfast, you'll leave Pellston and drive back to Alpena. En route, you can stop at the scenic Ocqueoc Falls for some hiking or photography time. Once in Alpena, you can relax and enjoy some local French cuisine at one of the city's restaurants.

Day 5 (March 10th): Alpena to Punta Gorda

* Distance: 2401 km (1500 miles) | Duration: 21 hours 39 minutes | Cost: $120

After breakfast, you'll leave Alpena and drive southwest to Punta Gorda. En route, you can stop at the scenic Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore for some hiking or beach time. Once in Punta Gorda, you can relax and enjoy some local American cuisine at one of the city's restaurants.

Budget Breakdown:

* Transportation: $260 (car rental for 7 days, gas for the trip)
* Accommodation: $1,040 (3 nights in Alpena, 2 nights in Traverse City, and 2 nights in Pellston)
* Food and Activities: $800 (dining at local restaurants, sightseeing, and entrance fees to parks and museums)

Total Budget: $4,440

Note: The budget breakdown is an estimate based on the information provided, and can be adjusted according to your preferences and spending habits. Additionally, the trip dates are flexible, and you can adjust them according to your schedule and preferences.
